adept-kb 2.2 API

Packages 
Package Description
adept.kbapi
This package consists of all classes and interfaces related to the Adept Knowledge Base v3.
adept.kbapi.sparql
Contains utility classes required to generate SPARQL queries to access and modify the KB triple store.
adept.kbapi.sql
Contains utility classes required to generate SQL queries to access and modify the KB metadata store.
adept.kbapi.sql.objects
Temporary classes that store results of metadata access queries.
adept.utilities
General KB utility classes.
